post.title: Teknically & Webplio
post.description: Brandon Chow & Andrew Paradi interviewed at Y Combinator, were part of Google for Entrepreneurs, developed Webplio: machine learning for Google Analytics.
post.excerpt: Brandon Chow  and I founded Teknically in October 2013 and over the next 13 months had a remarkable journey. Our product, Webplio, was a…
